p: Corona Infection which is now a day major concern worldwide need to root out. The analysis says that it is infecting with alarming rate as R o > 1 in most of the affected countries (Fig. 2). Which means the disease in epidemic is nature which is already proved. On 28 February 2020 globally there were 80,000 confirmed cases and till the end of March 2020 it has risen to more than 392,000 and death trolled to 17,146 as on 24 March and still increasing at the alarming rate. The cases have reached to 2,250,790 of which more than 154,000 has died and death rate has crossed 571,000 all over the world [ 28]. Though the lockdown across the world has lowered the R 0 but this downfall is quite negligible. Still this sign is relaxing to hear.
